setting.name: basicHomeScreenName
setting.description: This name will appear on the Basic Home screen menu that goes to OnlineVideos.

setting.name: autoGroupByLang
setting.displayname: Automatically group all sites by their language

setting.name: useQuickSelect
setting.displayname: Use alphanumeric keys to quickly select items by first letter

setting.name: cacheTimeout
setting.displayname: Time (minutes) to cache data from the web

setting.name: categoryDiscoveryTimeout
setting.displayname: Time (minutes) after which categories are reloaded from the web

setting.name: playbuffer
setting.displayname: Percentage to buffer before starting playback

setting.name: favoritesFirst
setting.displayname: Put Favorites and Downloads sites first in the list instead of last

setting.name: latestVideosRandomize
setting.displayname: Randomize all latest videos before displaying

setting.name: latestVideosOnlineDataRefresh
setting.displayname: Refresh latest videos data from web every x minutes

setting.name: latestVideosGuiDataRefresh
setting.displayname: Refresh displayed latest videos every x seconds
